website_summaries.verdict: A very powerful tool for all sorts of jobs at a price that also makes it a solid value.
pros: Option of drill bit kit add-on
Brushless motor means it is built to last a long time
Now manufactured under the brand name Metabo HPT
cons: Slightly slower top speed when drilling

customer_reviews.title: the charger died after first use!
customer_reviews.text: in general a good friller. but after first use of the charger, the charger strat to get out in smoke and died! i'll never buy Hitachi again!
customer_reviews.author: Meir

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: This is overkill for my needs. I am a using it for occasional around the house projects. Holds a charge for a very long time. Only got this because it was close in price to Black and Decker, $60 for this. I believe it was on sale due to the brand name change to Metabo from Hitachi.
customer_reviews.author: Gort

customer_reviews.title: good power reserve.
customer_reviews.text: good power reserve. compact. I use the first week, there are no problems. would buy again. thanks to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made Brushless
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish are good, the battery is large enough for a good working life on each charge. Light is in the handle so it is not shadowed by the chuck. Trigger and speed ranges are useful. Brushless motor should be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford H. Campen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is for a mechanical assembly shop. This tool has exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: David Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to find a drill not made in china. From my research I saw that Bosch, metabo, and Hitachi were the best candidates. Unfortunately this product is made in China and it is not disclosed by Hitachi or on this Amazon page.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill. Replacement for our old Mikita. Performs perfectly. Carry bag holds 2 batteries with drill. Would like to get a hard case, but carry bag is good and has its own advantages. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Really great. I like it even better than my Makita.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Had two, both broke
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a couple of these, through either Amazon or Lowe's, one was broken out of the box, the other broke within a month of use just doing small jobs around the house. Spend your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It is not my 1st Hitachi tool i have excellent experience with Hitachi tools.

product_meta.title: Hitachi DS18DBFL2S 18V Cordless Lithium Ion Brushless High Torque Driver Drill (Includes One 3.0Ah Compact Battery)
product_meta.description: Covered by Hitachi's Lifetime Lithium Ion tool warranty, the DS18DBFL2S Cordless Driver Drill with 1 battery features Hitachi's Brushless motor technology that delivers more power to the motor by minimizing unnecessary energy loss through friction and heat. Managed by a micro processor chip that efficiently delivers current flow to the motor, Brushless tools experience longer run time between charges, increased power, and extended durability with essentially no maintenance. Hitachi's signature ergonomic design for the tool body makes it extremely well balanced and comfortable for extended use. It is an ideal driver drill for drilling into wood, plastic, mild steel and aluminum, plus its 22+1 stage clutch with 22 torque settings and a drill mode allow for precision and control based on the application.
feature_bullets: Hitachi Power Tools has renamed to Metabo HPT; Same great tools, with only a new name
Powered by Hitachi's 18V Lithium Ion slide type battery for fade free power and lighter weight
Brushless Motor Technology for higher efficiency, increased run time and longer tool life
Professional grade power with 620 in/lbs of turning torque and up to 1,800 RPM
Ratcheting 1/2 inches keyless all metal chuck for quick and simple bit replacements and secure holding power
22 stage + 1 clutch settings delivers 22 torque settings and a drill mode for ultimate precision and control
Includes: (1) Lithium Ion 3.0Ah Slide Type Battery BSL1830C (339782), Charger (UC18YKSL), Carrying Bag (331417), #2 Phillips Bit (983006)
Metal belt hook so the tool is always close at hand
Covered by Hitachi's Lifetime Lithium Ion Tool Warranty, 2 Year Lithium Ion Battery Warranty and 1 Year Charger Warranty
